The method that creates a horizontal border and displays information about it

The method that creates a vertical border and displays information about it

B

BorderInt - Interface in work4
An interface for border that has a BorderInt.apply() method for setting border type

C

changeBorder(BorderInt) - Method in class work4.Facade
The method that changes the border type
Client - Class in work4
A class that acts as a client, that is, sets the transparency of the image, the opacity of the lines, the type of frame and the visibility of the subsystem using methods from the class Facade
Client() - Constructor for class work4.Client
Constructor for the class Client, it initializes a new Line and Image, and passes them to the Facade

F

Facade - Class in work4
A Class which is the facade, with which contains methods Facade.setImageTransparency(double), Facade.setLineOpacity(double), Facade.changeBorder(work4.BorderInt), Facade.show(boolean) with which you can set the transparency of the image, the opacity of the lines, the type of frame and the visibility of the subsystem
Facade(Line, Image) - Constructor for class work4.Facade
Constructor for the class Facade, initializes the facade with a specified Line and Image
FullBorder - Class in work4
A Class that implements the BorderInt interface and creates a complete border using FullBorder.apply() method
FullBorder() - Constructor for class work4.FullBorder
 

H

HorBorder - Class in work4
A Class that implements the BorderInt interface and creates a horizontal border using HorBorder.apply() method
HorBorder() - Constructor for class work4.HorBorder
 

I

Image - Class in work4
A Class that implements the ImageInt interface and represents image that can change transparency using the Image.setTransparency(double) method
Image() - Constructor for class work4.Image
 
ImageInt - Interface in work4
An interface for image that has a ImageInt.setTransparency(double) method to set the transparency of lines from 0 to 1

L

Line - Class in work4
A Class that implements the LineInt interface and represents a line that can change opacity using the Line.setOpacity(double) method
Line() - Constructor for class work4.Line
 
LineInt - Interface in work4
An interface for lines that has a LineInt.setOpacity(double) method to set the opacity of lines from 0 to 1

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class work4.Main
The main method that creates an instance of Client and runs its run() method
Main - Class in work4
Main class that contains a method that creates an instance of Client and runs its run() method
Main() - Constructor for class work4.Main
 

R

run() - Method in class work4.Client
The method that sets the transparency of the image, the opacity of the lines, the type of frame and the visibility of the subsystem using methods from the class Facade

The method that sets the transparency of the image

setTransparency(double) - Method in interface work4.ImageInt
The method that sets the transparency of lines
